resources.string: Power saver on, no item enabled

Enable the Background activity manager to extend battery life, but the notifications of some Apps or Emails may not be able to be retrieved instantly. You can manage the battery life by adding or removing the Apps to or from the whitelist.
To turn on the mechanism may result in that the applications cannot receive realtime information from the Internet during screen off.
To work properly, this app requires additional permission. Please allow permission when asked.
"ჯეროვანი მუშაობისათვის, ამ აპს ესაჭიროება დამატებითი უფლებები. Please manage %s's permission in Setting."

To turn on the mechanism may result in that the applications with alarm or notification functions cannot wake up device on time. It is recommended to add those applications into periodic wakeup white list from its setting page.
